title: Mayhem
description: Their world is about to be turned upside down.Nine months after the lights went out, Maddie Langston and the other survivors in Texas County just want to replenish their food stores and prepare for the next winter but an unexpected encounter with a stranger takes all their lives in a whole new direction.It's not just their lives on the line this time. The survival of entire nation could be at stake.Mayhem is book six in the Days of Want series.
author: T.L. Payne
